Regulation Name(s): CFTR (cystic fibrosis transmembrane conductance regulator) gene mutation detection system
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for xTAG Cystic Fibrosis 60 kit v2, a qualitative multiplex genetic test for CFTR gene mutations using the Luminex platform
Indications for Use Summary: Simultaneous qualitative detection and identification of a panel of CFTR gene mutations and variants in human blood, for carrier testing in adults of reproductive age, newborn screening aid, and confirmatory diagnostic testing in newborns and children (not for fetal/pre-implantation or stand-alone diagnostic use)
